name: The King's Dreams: A Hive Mind
description:
The silver tint of glory shines over a kingdom.
In his dreams, he no longer witnesses suffering or condemnation. The battle has been won and the victory recorded.
Now is the time to rebuild.
The soldiers work tirelessly to restore the confidence of the tribe. 
The community needs reassurance and so the inside job begins.
A golden gate is to be opened and a unanimous winner revealed.
But the whole must agree with the part.
The opening must begin in the hive of the Mind.
